title: Blueprint mag fonts
content:
A client fell in love with the loopy script font on the cover of Blueprint magazine, and the big, bold page numbers. Before I start scouring my font book and using Identifont, I thought I'd see if anyone here can ID them since I've never been let down on here.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027074014im_/http:/typophile.com/files/numbers_5461.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027074014im_/http:/typophile.com/files/title_6244.jpg)
author: rldkridel

comments.content: You guys never let me down. Thanks!
